definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: dedication, consecration, as a matter of usage only P and late (NH [[חֲנוּכָּה]] Feast of Dedication; so Aram. [[חֲנוּכְּתָא]])—abs ´[[ח]] Ne 12:27; cstr. [[חֲנֻכַּת]] Nu 7:10 + 6 t.; dedication of wall of Jerus. Ne 12:27, Ne 12:27, by sacrifices and processions, with music; of altar in temple 2Ch 7:9; of ‘ the house ’ Ps 30:1 (title), i.e. the temple (re-dedication by Judas Maccab., 1Ma 4:52 ff.), v. O1 Bae al. (opp. De), and esp. Che:OP 234. 247; = dedication-offering for altar in tabernacle Nu 7:10 (acc. c. [[וַיַּקְרִיבוּ]]), cf. [[יַקְרִיבוּ אֶת־קָרְבָּנׇם]] [[לַחֲנֻכַּת הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] v:Nu 7:11, also v:Nu 7:84, v:Nu 7:88 (all P; v Di Nu 7:20).
